name: Mission Into The Darkness World
description:
Mission Into The Darkness World is a small game made during the epicmegajam 2022,

The game is divided into two parts, the first part you have to remember the location of the books on the stone pillars, then you have to go get them in the darkness world.

And above all try to do the best possible time!

more information in the "how to play" section of the game

Control:

W - A - S - D and Z - Q - S - D

E to take a book

space bar to attack

escape to pause

Music :

 Adventure by Alexander Nakarada

Good day to die by miguel johnson
